response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We believe its worth exceeds $1,200,000, reflecting its unique capabilities and potential impact on your endeavors.

As an esteemed potential buyer, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price. For a limited time only, we are extending a generous offer of $950,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate, which we believe is a remarkable deal considering its unparalleled features and benefits.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find the product to be a strategic addition to your collection or operations, and we look forward to the possibility of working together.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is here to assist you in any way possible.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
